name: Mad Factory
description: WELCOME TO THE FACTORY! In Mad Factory you’re the new hire in the universe's finest cookie factory–and you’ve got orders to fill! See who can make, bake and frost the most cookies and reach the top of the leaderboard! Can you keep your cool and deliver the goods in this addictive VR experience?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1300 MB available space
